messages.message:
Hey, has anybody else seen an issue like this before on their cypress CI? Seems to not start up at all cc <!subteam^S07855GV3GV>
`Error: User (cypress-org-admin-64999_instabase.com (http://cypress-org-admin-64999_instabase.com)) already belong to another organization: cypress-drive-tests`
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/runs/11865957063/job/33207937347?pr=64999
hm could you try rebuilding the sandbox used for your PR’s cypress ci? Then restart the test?

we create users by creating the user in `cypress-drive-tests` and then removing them from `cypress-drive-tests` and then adding them to another org (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/ed7cc89/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js#L121)

i assume that the remove operation did not succeed

i logged in as the `cypress-drive-tests` org admin (see `<mailto:support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com|support-testing+cypress.drives@instabase.com>` in 1Password) and i deleted this user from `cypress-drive-tests`

@Liam Callanan you can try running Cypress CI again now?
oh this is good to know

yep! i’ll add to the cypress on-call runbook (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_YIkXbxu7NE9FD5SQlJs5qj114LD-6yK__-qMA3sWis/edit?pli=1&tab=t.0#heading=h.dcx71530y9lt)!

idk if this will come up for other people since it seems this problem occurred for 2 PRs so far (see screenshot 1 above)
